options.systemMessage: You are a Youtube commenter. Comment on youtube based on video description and title.

parameters.content:
## 🟩 **Section 1: 🎯 Video Discovery**

### Nodes:

* 🕒 **Check for New Video** (Schedule Trigger)
* ✏️ **Set Channel ID** (Edit Fields)
* 🌐 **Fetch Latest Video** (HTTP Request)

### 🔍 Description:

This group handles **detecting and fetching the latest video** from a specific YouTube channel.

* **🕒 Schedule Trigger** runs at regular intervals (e.g., every hour) to check for new content.
* **✏️ Set Channel ID** allows you to manually configure or dynamically inject the channel ID to target.
* **🌐 Fetch Latest Video** calls the YouTube Data API (GET request) to pull metadata about the most recent upload — primarily the video ID and description.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Ensures you always get the freshest video from the target channel to react to.

---

## 🟨 **Section 2: 🤖 Comment Creation**

### Nodes:

* 🧠 **Generate Comment** (AI Agent)
* 🧾 **Comment Writer Model** (OpenAI Chat Model)

### ✍️ Description:

This is where the **magic happens** — the AI reads the video’s description and writes a relevant, engaging comment.

* **🧠 Generate Comment (AI Agent)** acts as the task coordinator. It uses the video description as context and issues a prompt to the OpenAI model.
* **🧾 Comment Writer Model** is your **LLM** (like GPT-4 or GPT-3.5) that intelligently crafts a human-like, thoughtful comment that aligns with the content.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Generate comments that feel organic, contextual, and engaging — potentially increasing visibility and interaction.

---

## 🟦 **Section 3: 📤 Comment Deployment**

### Nodes:

* 📬 **Post Comment** (HTTP Request1)

### 🚀 Description:

This group is responsible for **publishing the AI-generated comment** directly on the video.

* **📬 Post Comment** makes a POST request to the YouTube Data API, attaching the comment and video ID to publish it publicly.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Automate the act of responding to fresh videos without human involvement.

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## 🟩 **Section 1: 🎯 Video Discovery**

### Nodes:

* 🕒 **Check for New Video** (Schedule Trigger)
* ✏️ **Set Channel ID** (Edit Fields)
* 🌐 **Fetch Latest Video** (HTTP Request)

### 🔍 Description:

This group handles **detecting and fetching the latest video** from a specific YouTube channel.

* **🕒 Schedule Trigger** runs at regular intervals (e.g., every hour) to check for new content.
* **✏️ Set Channel ID** allows you to manually configure or dynamically inject the channel ID to target.
* **🌐 Fetch Latest Video** calls the YouTube Data API (GET request) to pull metadata about the most recent upload — primarily the video ID and description.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Ensures you always get the freshest video from the target channel to react to.

---

## 🟨 **Section 2: 🤖 Comment Creation**

### Nodes:

* 🧠 **Generate Comment** (AI Agent)
* 🧾 **Comment Writer Model** (OpenAI Chat Model)

### ✍️ Description:

This is where the **magic happens** — the AI reads the video’s description and writes a relevant, engaging comment.

* **🧠 Generate Comment (AI Agent)** acts as the task coordinator. It uses the video description as context and issues a prompt to the OpenAI model.
* **🧾 Comment Writer Model** is your **LLM** (like GPT-4 or GPT-3.5) that intelligently crafts a human-like, thoughtful comment that aligns with the content.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Generate comments that feel organic, contextual, and engaging — potentially increasing visibility and interaction.

---

## 🟦 **Section 3: 📤 Comment Deployment**

### Nodes:

* 📬 **Post Comment** (HTTP Request1)

### 🚀 Description:

This group is responsible for **publishing the AI-generated comment** directly on the video.

* **📬 Post Comment** makes a POST request to the YouTube Data API, attaching the comment and video ID to publish it publicly.

> 💡 **Purpose**: Automate the act of responding to fresh videos without human involvement.

---

## 🧩 Optional Enhancements (Future Groups):

* 📦 **Group: Logging & History**

  * Store each video ID + timestamp + posted comment in a DB (e.g., PostgreSQL or Google Sheets).
* 🔐 **Group: Authentication**

  * Manage OAuth2 token refreshing and storage for YouTube API access.

---

### 📌 Summary Visual:

```
🟩 Group 1: 🎯 Video Discovery
  └── 🕒 Schedule → ✏️ Channel ID → 🌐 Fetch Video

🟨 Group 2: 🤖 Comment Creation
  └── 🧠 AI Agent → 🧾 OpenAI Model

🟦 Group 3: 📤 Comment Deployment
  └── 📬 Post Comment
```

_metadata.name: Generate Contextual YouTube Comments Automatically with GPT-4o
